titles.title: National 9/11 Memorial at the World Trade Center Act
To designate the National September 11 Memorial located at the World Trade Center site in New York City, New York, as a national memorial, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
7/13/2015--Introduced. National 9/11 Memorial at the World Trade Center Act
This bill designates the National September 11 Memorial located at the World Trade Center in New York City, New York, as a national memorial.
The Department of the Interior may award a grant of not more than $25 million each fiscal year to the National September 11 Memorial and Museum at the World Trade Center Foundation, Inc., for the operation and maintenance of the memorial.
